testcase.classname: Get the first returned value in Search
testcase.name: Open Google and verify the first returned value
testcase.system-out: Given user is on home page where URL is "http://www.google.com".............passed When user search for "fiserv" in "google"...................................passed Then get the first returned value in "google" and compare with "https://www.fiserv.com/".passed

testcase.classname: Get the first returned value in Search
testcase.name: Open Google and verify the first returned value 2
testcase.system-out: Given user is on home page where URL is "http://www.yahoo.com"..............passed When user search for "fiserv" in "yahoo"....................................passed Then get the first returned value in "yahoo" and compare with "https://www.fiserv.com/".passed
